segments.advisor_message: Can you tell me a bit about your current health status and if there are any health concerns we should discuss?
segments.client_message: Uh, well, my health, it's okay, I guess? I mean, I'm a smoker, have been for, like, ages. Since I was, um, I think it was, like, 18 or so? I smoke, um, around a pack a day—so, maybe 20, yeah. Oh, and I don’t have a will or anything, don't even have power of attorney, no plans to do that yet. But later I might need long-term care, like if things get worse you know? So, um, I guess just trying to figure it out.
